suddenly slashed at Lance."},{"lineNumber":207674,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおおおおおおおお！","translatedEnglishLine":"Uoooooo!"},{"lineNumber":207675,"originalJapaneseLine":"　渾身の一撃をあっさりと防ぐか！","translatedEnglishLine":"To think he effortlessly blocked that full-power strike!"},{"lineNumber":207676,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐわっはははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"Gwahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":207677,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さすがオレの親父殿！","translatedEnglishLine":"As expected of my father!"},{"lineNumber":207678,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いや、母殿の選んだ男！」","translatedEnglishLine":"No, the man my mother chose!"},{"lineNumber":207679,"originalJapaneseLine":"「面白い！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"This is interesting!!!!"},{"lineNumber":207680,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王ゲンコツ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon King's Fist!"},{"lineNumber":207681,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが元就の頭をゴチーンと殴った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance knocked Mototsune on the head with a 'gochin'."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺だって、お前にだけは似たくなかったよ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never wanted to resemble you, you know...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それより俺を親父と呼ぶな。
「しかし、親はなくとも子は育つというが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say children grow even without parents,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 案外成長しているもんだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and surprisingly, they do grow up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんないっぱいいっぱい立派になったんだよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone has grown up to be quite respectable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっとも成長しとらんな」
「いや、お前は成長せんでいいぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, you don’t have to grow up.
You’re fine just as you are.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぜーーったい、リセットは美人に育つからな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset will definitely grow up to be beautiful,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺に抱けない上に他の男が言い寄るかと思うと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the thought that she won’t be mine to hold but other men will hit on her...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむむ、恐ろしいことだ……」
「クソ親父の癖に的を射たこと言うな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don’t say something sensible, you damn old man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その姿なら変な男に言い寄られることもないだろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With how you look, no strange men would come near you anyway.
Hey, I’m just worried about you, you know?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前は出来るだけそのままを維持しろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You should keep yourself just the way you are as much as possible.
She will definitely, definitely grow up!
Not just being a doting big brother,
now there are doting parents too...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、元々ランスは親ばかひどかったから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, Lance has always been ridiculously doting anyway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結婚することがあったら苦労するね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: will have a tough time if she ever gets married...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、他の連中は赤ん坊の頃以来見てないが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, I haven’t seen the others since they were babies...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんとなぁーく、分かってきたな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I’m starting to get a vague idea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 髪の色と鎧からして、ザンス？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: judging by your hair color and armor, Zansu?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リアの子だ、そうだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You must be Ria’s child, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、こっちが雰囲気からして……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And this one here, judging by the vibe...
is Rangi, the child of Fifty-Six.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご無沙汰をしておりました、父上。
山本乱義、お察しの通り山本五十六の子です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am Yamamoto Rangi, as you guessed, the child of Yamamoto Fifty-Six.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとなく見覚えのある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: someone whose fashion sense looks vaguely familiar...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ファッションセンスだが……
元就は突然、ランスに斬りかかった。
渾身の一撃をあっさりと防ぐか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To think he effortlessly blocked that full-power strike!
No, the man my mother chose!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが元就の頭をゴチーンと殴った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance knocked Mototsune on the head with a 'gochin'.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
